title: Imac 27" Late 2009 (i7) Only cold boots
message:
Hi, ive got a really odd system in, it only fully boots when the systems been left and is cold, As soon as the system warms up it sticks on the loading screen, Ive tested a new GPU in there and its all the same.
Any ideas?
Thanks

title: Imac 27" Late 2009 (i7) Only cold boots
message: Run ASD in loop to see if anything pops up.....

title: Imac 27" Late 2009 (i7) Only cold boots
message: Yeah not much else to do than GPU and RAM. After that it can be anything.

title: Imac 27" Late 2009 (i7) Only cold boots
message: Changed GPU and ram, Only boots in the cold, ASD only boots in the cold aswell, It runs fine once booted but just sticks if its warm.

title: Imac 27" Late 2009 (i7) Only cold boots
message: Could be absolutely anything, no ideas. Would not waste too much time on this one.
